如口欲施虐(oral sadism),指个体不自觉地咬人或咬坏东西的口腔倾向。具有这种人格倾向的成人,喜欢争论并刻薄地挖苦人,喋喋不休,疑心很重,甚至喜欢盘剥他人,以及.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French sadisme, from the name of the Marquis de Sade

entry.def: Sadism is a type of behaviour in which a person obtains pleasure from hurting other people and making them suffer physically or mentally.

example.ex: Psychoanalysts tend to regard both sadism and masochism as arising from childhood deprivation.
example.tran: 精神分析学家往往认为施虐狂和受虐狂都是由于儿时缺乏关爱造成的。

means.word_mean: 1. sexual pleasure obtained by inflicting harm (physical or psychological) on others
